DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether two month youth soccer , combine single brief behavioral/nutritional intervention , reduce BMI 5th grade overweight obese female .
DOC.detailed_description: Female overweight obese public school student recruit summer 2006 base FitnessGram test do graduate student MSU prior ( 4th grade ) school year . After receive informed consent parent/child , subject check height/weight screen criterion , exposed 2005 My Pyramid Kids , `` Tips Families '' information , watch short 8 minute DVD discuss importance exercise fitness way interview two club level female soccer player equivalent age . Subjects randomly assign fall youth soccer Starkville , spring youth soccer , first phase data collection occur November , 2006 .
DOC.criteria: obese overweight 4th grade public school student Starkville unable run physical disease disability
